mapper.select: SELECT TMEMB.MEMBER_ID, TMEMB.FORM_ID, TMEMB.POSITION_CODE, TMEMB.SURNAME, TMEMB.GIVEN_NAME, TMEMB.MIDDLE_INITIAL, TMEMB.REGISTRATION_STATUS_CODE, TMEMB.AGE, TMEMB.MEMBERSHIP_CERT_NO, TMEMB.HIGHEST_BADGE_CODE, TMEMB.TENURE, TMEMB.RELIGION, TMEMB.CREATED_BY, TMEMB.CREATED_DATETIME, TMEMB.UPDATED_BY, TMEMB.UPDATED_DATETIME FROM T_MEMBER_DETAILS TMEMB ORDER BY TMEMB.POSITION_CODE ASC, TMEMB.MEMBER_ID ASC

SELECT TMEMB.MEMBER_ID, TMEMB.FORM_ID, TMEMB.POSITION_CODE, TMEMB.SURNAME, TMEMB.GIVEN_NAME, TMEMB.MIDDLE_INITIAL, TMEMB.REGISTRATION_STATUS_CODE, TMEMB.AGE, TMEMB.MEMBERSHIP_CERT_NO, TMEMB.HIGHEST_BADGE_CODE, TMEMB.TENURE, TMEMB.RELIGION, TMEMB.CREATED_BY, TMEMB.CREATED_DATETIME, TMEMB.UPDATED_BY, TMEMB.UPDATED_DATETIME FROM T_MEMBER_DETAILS TMEMB WHERE TMEMB.FORM_ID = #{formId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY TMEMB.POSITION_CODE ASC, TMEMB.MEMBER_ID ASC
